metadata.topic: I believe there is no point/benefit spending time hating or expressing hate (via comments, writing, images etc) for celebrities like Justin Bieber. CMV.

moderator_initial_opinion:
a) Generally Agree with the statement

I generally agree because expressing hate towards celebrities like Justin Bieber often does more harm than good, fostering negativity without contributing to meaningful change or personal growth.
